job.title: Software Engineer I
job.industry: Computer Hardware,Computer Software,Information Technology and Services
job.description: ltstronggtwake up every morning with the opportunity to make a dramatic impact in peoples livesltstronggt we are an incubation studio with a mission to enable people with more personalized care in the home the covid crisis presents an opportunity for microsoft to participate in a dramatic shift with regards to how both society and the medical community view the delivery of health care covid has shifted the standard office visit into the home advancing the demand for virtual care and accelerating a longforecasted trend for a new healthcare segment in home healthcareltbrgtltbrgtthis emergence will democratize the delivery care enabling more virtual care services such as remote monitoring into the home as a result the notion of inhome care services also referred to as connected care will become an increasingly used and vital mechanism for everyone on the planetltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtthe company and teamltstronggt at microsoft we have a clear mission and bold ambitions empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more through our technology and innovation to make that a reality our health next connected care team is charged with incubating and delivering solutions that help transform these new opportunities into innovative solutions leveraging both existing and emerging technologies our goal is to enable new ways to broaden access to care ultimately assisting the industry in to drive better health care experiences and outcomes for people around the worldltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltbrgtwere a small but growing team and wed love for you to be a part of our story come join a positive and collaborative and passionate group of peoplewhere everyone is encouraged to bring their authentic selvesand work at the forefront of innovation and transformationltbrgtltbrgtconnectedcare research incubationltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtcandidate responsibilities bring the project to life ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtqualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtrequired qualificationsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt a computer science background bs or equivalent degree or equivalent industry experience ltligtltligtexperience with awsazuregcpbased technologies and building distributed system and services ltligtltligt years of professional
